<center> <h4>
Criteria for filtering metadata</h4> </center>

We filter the metadata based on the follwoing critera: 

* Properties that contain a single value
* Properties with incoherent information regarding visualization such as dates, time, download path and so on.

Although the filtered metadata table is printed here, the full metadata is available to download.
